mapper.insert: insert into tbl_company (companyid, company_name, pw, email, mobile, registerday, lastpwdchangedate, status, idle) values (#{companyid},#{company_name},#{pw},#{email},#{mobile},default, default, default, default)

insert into tbl_lodging (lodging_code , local_status, lodging_category, fk_companyid, lodging_name, lodging_tell, lodging_content, lodging_address, main_img, filename, orgfilename, filesize) values(seq_common.nextval,#{local_status},#{lodging_category},#{fk_companyid},#{lodging_name},#{lodging_tell},#{lodging_content},#{lodging_address},#{fileName},#{fileName},#{orgFilename},#{fileSize})
mapper.select: select lodging_code, local_status, lodging_category, fk_companyid, lodging_name, lodging_tell, lodging_content, lodging_address, main_img, filename, orgfilename, filesize, status from tbl_lodging where status = #{choice_status} order by lodging_code asc
